directions: In microwave-safe bowl, stir instant oatmeal with 2 cups (500 mL) milk; microwave for 2 to 3 minutes or until tender.

Meanwhile, in blender, combine remaining milk, honey, 1 cup (250 mL) berries and banana; puree until smooth. Divide oatmeal evenly among 4 bowls; top evenly with smoothie and swirl with spoon. Garnish with remaining berries.
ingredients: 4 (28 g) packets Quaker® Regular Instant Oatmeal
title: Quaker® Oatmeal Smoothie Swirl
